sentences.sContent: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
sentences.sContent_eng: Give ye ear, and hear my voice; hearken, and hear my speech.
sentences.sCn: 你们当侧耳听我的声音，留心听我的言语。

sentences.sContent: Hear now my reasoning, and hearken to the pleadings of my lips.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hear now my reasoning, and hearken to the pleadings of my lips.
sentences.sCn: 请你们听我的辩论，留心听我口中的分诉。

sentences.sContent: If now thou hast understanding, hear this: hearken to the voice of my words.
sentences.sContent_eng: If now thou hast understanding, hear this: hearken to the voice of my words.
sentences.sCn: 你若明理，就当听我的话，留心听我言语的声音。
